articles.author: Ellen Nakashima
articles.title: Video shows Chinese jet flying within 10 feet of B-52, U.S. says - The Washington Post
articles.description: The nighttime incident involved a Chinese J-11 fighter closing in quickly on the U.S. Air Force B-52, passing in front of and below the American jet’s wing.
